entries.title_d: Although the reinforcements arrived late, a opportunity have opened up for you to make something of it. The Empire is testing out some of their new TIE models in a nearby area, lets teach them a real lesson.
entries.title: Yavin system: Attack one of the Empires new experimental TIE ships.
entries.quest_location_d: Yavin is not a high risk system to experienced pilots like yourself but if the Empire is testing experimental fighters, you can bet they will be well guarded.
entries.quest_helpallies_d: Support your X-Wing squadron and complete a vicious strike against the Imperial forces in the area.
entries.quest_findbattle_d: Your reinforcements will meet up with you at these coordinates, proceed quickly but with caution.
entries.found_loc: The rest of your squadron will meet you in this area. We have the opportunity to take on one of the Empires new experimental TIE ships.
entries.enemies_win: Pull out pilot, you're getting crushed over there!
entries.enemies_remain: Tactical Computer: < Sensors show enemy target terminated. %DI enemy targets remain. >
entries.enemies_arrived: Brother Extok Evin: < Our reconnaissance ship has confirmed a TIE ship model Oppressor in the target wing. This should be interesting. >
entries.battle_started: Alright, show them what you guys can do!
entries.allies_win: Good job everyone, I'm very impressed! Return to base for debrief everyone.
entries.allies_remain: Rebel Pilot: < I can't shake this one! Missile war... >
entries.allies_arrived: Join up with the rest of your squadron as soon as you can.
